alert.note: Alert for Leflore (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 14 at 8:49PM CDT until June 15 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 930 PM CDT FOR HOLMES...SOUTHWESTERN LEFLORE AND NORTHEASTERN HUMPHREYS COUNTIES... At 848 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Belzoni, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Thornton around 900 PM CDT. Tchula and Howard around 905 PM CDT. Lexington around 915 PM CDT. Franklin around 920 PM CDT. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
